translations: vt.用引水槽输送；用引水槽引

sentences.sentence: A typical Flume application consists of processes of two types.
sentences.translation: 典型的Flume应用由两类进程构成。

sentences.sentence: Continuously monitor, display, totalize and data log flow through any flume or weir.
sentences.translation: 连续监测，显示，总计和数据记录或通过任何堰流水槽。

sentences.sentence: Flume was able to prevent the content of the calendar to be displayed simply based on its standard policies.
sentences.translation: 而仅仅用了标准策略，Flume就能阻止不该显示的日历内容。
